text: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil is a 1997 American mystery thriller movie directed by Clint Eastwood and was based on the 1994 novel of the same name by John Berendt. It stars Kevin Spacey, John Cusack, Jack Thompson, Jude Law, Alison Eastwood, Geoffrey Lewis, Georgia Allen, Emma Kelly, Kim Hunter, Bob Gunton and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1990s mystery movies Category:1997 crime thriller movies Category:1997 LGBT movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood
title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (movie)
